articles.description: Live text commentary of Gibraltar versus Republic of Ireland in a Euro 2024 Group B qualifier at Estádio Algarve, Faro in Portugal.
articles.title: Euro 2024 qualifier: Gibraltar v Republic of Ireland

articles.description: Australia finally get their first win of the World Cup, but only after surviving some nervy moments against Sri Lanka.
articles.title: Australia beat Sri Lanka for first World Cup win

articles.description: Ex-England captain Matt Dawson praises the side's World Cup quarter-final win against Fiji and warns of a greater challenge to come.
articles.title: ‘Impressive England will need more against South Africa in semi-finals’

articles.description: England defender Kyle Walker is hopeful the Three Lions can get "payback" in Tuesday's Euro 2024 qualifier against reigning champions Italy.
articles.title: England ready for 'payback' against Italy - Walker

articles.description: Watch highlights as Australia hold their nerve to claim a five-wicket victory over Sri Lanka at the Cricket World Cup in Lucknow.
articles.title: Australia hold nerve to pick up first World Cup win

articles.description: Illia Kvasnytsya's 94th-minute winner gives Ukraine a dramatic victory over England Under-21s in Euro 2025 qualifying.
articles.title: Ukraine stun England U21s with dramatic late win

articles.description: Featherweight Connor Coghill is in hospital after a bleed on his brain was discovered in the wake of the Briton's defeat by Hopey Price in Sheffield on 7 October.
articles.title: Britain's Coghill in hospital with bleed on brain

articles.description: World champion Natasha Jonas becomes the first black woman to get a British Boxing Board of Control manager's licence.
articles.title: Jonas creates history with manager's licence

articles.description: Manager Steve Clarke expects to see players challenging for Euro 2024 places when Scotland take on World Cup runners-up France on Tuesday.
articles.title: Taking on the best important for Scotland - Clarke

articles.description: Sri Lanka's Dilshan Madushanka takes a double-wicket maiden to remove Australia's David Warner and Steven Smith during their Cricket World Cup match in Lucknow.
articles.title: Madushanka removes Warner & Smith in same over
